sentences.english: The spring water is of dark green, deep and running all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 泉水碧綠凝重，深不見底，終年湧流不息。

sentences.english: Under water that was clear as glass the pool was carpeted with green sponge.
sentences.chinese: 在清明如鏡的水底鋪着一層碧綠的海綿。

sentences.english: A verdurous snake wreathing in a puddle of unknown green liquid above the ground.
sentences.chinese: 一條碧綠的蛇盤臥在地面上一灘綠色的不明液體中。

sentences.english: The garden, a variety of vegetables mother, dark green piece.
sentences.chinese: 花園裏，母親種的各樣菜蔬，碧綠一片。

sentences.english: The doors opened and she found herself stepping out onto the putting green of a beautiful golf course.
sentences.chinese: 門打開了，她發現自己踏上了一片碧綠的高爾夫球場。

sentences.english: Serve the spring rolls with sweet chilli sauce and mixed salad leaves.
sentences.chinese: 佐以甜辣醬和綜合碧綠沙拉食用。

sentences.english: The sky was blue, the larks was soaring high over the green corn.
sentences.chinese: 長天一片澄藍，碧綠的莊稼上雲雀凌空穿飛。

sentences.english: From the green steeples of the piny wood;
sentences.chinese: 松樹林子裏，從那碧綠的樹梢。
雨水浸過的草，清澈，碧綠。

sentences.english: Why people would like to plant peaches and plums, oranges can also become green and blooming.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大家只說要栽桃李，難道橘樹就不能碧綠成陰？

sentences.english: You know, fine green tea not only has its delicate fragrance and mellowness, but also its typical pure green color.
sentences.chinese: 你知道，好的綠茶不僅芳香濃郁，而且顏色碧綠。

sentences.english: I have captured the rich blue sky, and the crystal clear greeneries.
sentences.chinese: 我把當天尉藍的天，碧綠的樹，都一一捕獲。

sentences.english: Flow gently, sweet Afton, among thy green braes.
sentences.chinese: 輕輕地流淌，甜美的亞頓河，在碧綠的山坡之間。

sentences.english: The white sulfur reflects light, tinting the water bright green along the Namibian coast.
sentences.chinese: 白色硫磺反光，將納米比亞沿岸的水着成碧綠色。

sentences.english: Roadside rhododendron, scattered on the green grass.
sentences.chinese: 路旁的杜鵑，散落在碧綠的草叢裏。

sentences.english: Emerald-green wheat grew in the fields by the side of the road, swaying evenly in the wind.
sentences.chinese: 路邊的田裏長着碧綠的青麥子，整齊地隨風搖曳。

definition: all the colors in profusion (idiom); a garish display
to flit across/to sweep past/to glance (strike at an angle)
water so clear you can see the bottom
